mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.deviceid AS "deviceId", a.data AS "data", a.datatime AS "dataTime", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM energy_elec_day a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.deviceId = #{deviceId}
AND a.datatime LIKE CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(#{dataTime}, '%Y-%m'),'%' )
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy},a.datatime
ORDER BY a.datatime
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO energy_elec_day( id, deviceid, data, datatime, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{deviceId}, #{data}, #{dataTime}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE energy_elec_day SET deviceid = #{deviceId}, data = #{data}, datatime = #{dataTime}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
